content.title: Configuring Update Operation
content.body:
1. From the Project explorer, expand Responsive Web/ Desktop > Forms > frmEditRecipient > flxEntryFields > flxButtons, and select btnUpdate.
  2. From the Data & Services panel, expand Project Services > RecipientStorage > Recipients.
  3. Select the update operation and drop it onto the Update button on the canvas.
  4. From the list of actions, select Action: onClick.
    The Action Editor window appears with a mapping editor on the right pane.
  5. From the top-right corner of the Action Editor window, select Design View.
